zh-cn: 玛丽-安东妮‧约瑟芬‧珍妮‧德‧哈布斯堡-洛林
en: Maria Antonia Josepha Johanna von Habsburg-Lothringen

description.zh-cn: 奥地利女大公，通过与路易十六的婚姻成为法国和纳瓦拉的末代王后。她在法国大革命期间被推翻并被革命法庭判处叛国罪，最终被送上断头台。
description.en: Archduchess of Austria who became the last Queen of France and Navarre through her marriage to Louis XVI. She was overthrown during the French Revolution, convicted of high treason by the Revolutionary Tribunal, and executed by guillotine.

description.zh-cn: 法国波旁王朝的最后一任国王，在法国大革命期间被废黜并被处决。
description.en: The last King of France of the House of Bourbon, who was deposed and executed during the French Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 哈布斯堡王朝的统治者，奥地利女大公、匈牙利和波希米亚女王，以及通过婚姻成为神圣罗马帝国皇后。她是玛丽·安托瓦内特的母亲。
description.en: Ruler of the Habsburg dominions, Archduchess of Austria, Queen of Hungary and Bohemia, and Holy Roman Empress by marriage. She was the mother of Marie Antoinette.

nodes.id: 法兰兹一世 (神圣罗马帝国)

zh-cn: 法兰兹一世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 神圣罗马帝国皇帝及托斯卡纳大公，通过与玛丽亚·特蕾莎的婚姻，他是哈布斯堡-洛林王朝的创始人。他是玛丽·安托瓦内特的父亲。
description.en: Holy Roman Emperor and Grand Duke of Tuscany, founder of the House of Habsburg-Lorraine through his marriage to Maria Theresa. He was the father of Marie Antoinette.

description.zh-cn: 一场深刻的社会和政治动荡时期，导致法国君主制被推翻，建立了共和国，并最终导致了拿破仑·波拿巴的崛起。
description.en: A period of profound social and political upheaval that led to the overthrow of the French monarchy, the establishment of a republic, and ultimately culminated in the rise of Napoleon Bonaparte.

description.zh-cn: 一宗涉及诈骗珠宝商购买昂贵钻石项链的宫廷丑闻。尽管玛丽·安托瓦内特并未涉案，但这起事件严重损害了她的声誉。
description.en: A court scandal involving a scheme to defraud jewelers of the price of an expensive diamond necklace. Although Marie Antoinette was not involved, the incident severely damaged her reputation.

description.zh-cn: 法国国王，路易十六的祖父。他促成了玛丽·安托瓦内特与路易十六的婚姻。
description.en: King of France and grandfather of Louis XVI. He arranged the marriage between Marie Antoinette and Louis XVI.

description.zh-cn: 法国国王路易十五的最后一位情妇，在宫廷中与玛丽·安托瓦内特关系紧张。
description.en: The last official mistress of King Louis XV of France, who had a tense relationship with Marie Antoinette at court.

nodes.id: 汉斯·阿克塞尔·冯·费尔森

zh-cn: 汉斯·阿克塞尔·冯·费尔森

description.zh-cn: 瑞典伯爵、外交官和军官，被认为是玛丽·安托瓦内特的密友和情人，并策划了王室的出逃计划。
description.en: A Swedish count, diplomat, and officer, believed to be a close friend and lover of Marie Antoinette, who organized the royal family's flight to Varennes.

nodes.id: 约瑟夫二世 (神圣罗马帝国)

zh-cn: 约瑟夫二世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 神圣罗马帝国皇帝，玛丽·安托瓦内特的兄长。他曾访问法国，试图解决妹妹婚姻中的问题并巩固法奥同盟。
description.en: Holy Roman Emperor and brother of Marie Antoinette. He visited France to address issues in his sister's marriage and to strengthen the Franco-Austrian alliance.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命期间，国王路易十六、王后玛丽·安托瓦内特及其家人试图逃离巴黎但失败的事件。此事严重损害了君主制在民众中的信誉。
description.en: A failed attempt by King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette, and their family to escape from Paris during the French Revolution. The event severely damaged the credibility of the monarchy among the populace.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命期间由国民公会设立的法庭，用于审判政治犯。该法庭判处玛丽·安托瓦内特死刑。
description.en: A court instituted by the National Convention during the French Revolution for the trial of political offenders. It sentenced Marie Antoinette to death.

description.zh-cn: 神圣罗马帝国的重要邦国，哈布斯堡王朝的核心领土，也是玛丽·安托瓦内特的故国。
description.en: A major state within the Holy Roman Empire and the heartland of the Habsburg monarchy, it was Marie Antoinette's country of origin.

description.zh-cn: 一个存在于中世纪至近代早期的君主制国家。玛丽·安托瓦内特是其末代王后。
description.en: A monarchy in Western Europe that existed from the Middle Ages to the early modern period. Marie Antoinette was its last queen consort.

en: Honoré Gabriel Riqueti, comte de Mirabeau

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命初期的领袖人物，主张君主立宪制。他曾秘密与玛丽·安托瓦内特合作，试图调和君主制与革命。
description.en: A leader in the early stages of the French Revolution who advocated for a constitutional monarchy. He secretly collaborated with Marie Antoinette to try to reconcile the monarchy with the revolution.

en: Gilbert du Motier, Marquis de Lafayette

description.zh-cn: 法国贵族和军官，在美国独立战争和法国大革命中扮演了关键角色。他担任国民自卫军总司令，负责监护被软禁的王室，与玛丽·安托瓦内特关系复杂。
description.en: A French aristocrat and military officer who played a key role in the American Revolutionary War and the French Revolution. As commander of the National Guard, he was responsible for the custody of the royal family and had a complex relationship with Marie Antoinette.

description.zh-cn: 由普鲁士和奥地利军队指挥官布伦瑞克公爵发布的宣言，威胁称如果法国王室受到伤害，将摧毁巴黎。此宣言激化了革命情绪。
description.en: A proclamation issued by the Duke of Brunswick, commander of the allied Prussian and Austrian army, threatening the destruction of Paris if the French royal family were harmed. The manifesto radicalized the revolution.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命的关键事件之一，武装革命者攻占杜乐丽宫，导致法国君主制的垮台。
description.en: A defining event of the French Revolution, where armed revolutionaries stormed the Tuileries Palace, leading to the collapse of the French monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 一种在法国大革命期间被广泛用于执行死刑的装置，玛丽·安托瓦内特在此装置上被处决。
description.en: A device widely used for executions during the French Revolution, on which Marie Antoinette was executed.

description.zh-cn: 在法国大革命恐怖统治时期，实际上的法国执政机构，由罗伯斯比尔主导，预先决定了对玛丽·安托瓦内特的审判结果。
description.en: The de facto executive government of France during the Reign of Terror, dominated by Robespierre, which predetermined the outcome of Marie Antoinette's trial.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命中的温和派政治家，在王室逃亡失败后护送他们返回巴黎，并试图与玛丽·安托瓦内特合作建立君主立宪制。
description.en: A moderate politician during the French Revolution who escorted the royal family back to Paris after their failed flight and attempted to work with Marie Antoinette to establish a constitutional monarchy.

zh-cn: 法兰西王国长公主玛丽-泰蕾兹

description.zh-cn: 路易十六和玛丽·安托瓦内特的长女，也是他们四个孩子中唯一活到成年的。
description.en: The eldest child of Louis XVI and Marie Antoinette, and the only one of their four children to survive to adulthood.

nodes.id: 路易-约瑟夫 (法国王太子)

zh-cn: 路易-约瑟夫 (法国王太子)
法国王太子路易-约瑟夫

description.zh-cn: 路易十六和玛丽·安托瓦内特的长子，法国王太子，因肺结核早逝。
description.en: The eldest son and Dauphin of France of Louis XVI and Marie Antoinette, who died young from tuberculosis.

description.zh-cn: 路易十六和玛丽·安托瓦内特的次子，在他父亲被处决后被保皇派承认为法兰西国王，但在囚禁中早逝。
description.en: The second son of Louis XVI and Marie Antoinette, recognized by royalists as King of France after his father's execution, who died in captivity at a young age.

zh-cn: 法兰西王国公主苏菲·海伦·碧雅翠丝

description.zh-cn: 路易十六和玛丽·安托瓦内特的小女儿，在婴儿时期夭折。
description.en: The youngest daughter of Louis XVI and Marie Antoinette, who died in infancy.

description.zh-cn: 玛丽·安托瓦内特与时为法国王太子的路易-奥古斯特结婚，成为法国王太子妃，后成为王后。
description.en: Marie Antoinette married Louis-Auguste, then the Dauphin of France, becoming the Dauphine and later the Queen.

description.zh-cn: 玛丽·安托瓦内特是奥地利女皇玛丽亚·特蕾莎最小的女儿。
description.en: Marie Antoinette was the youngest daughter of Empress Maria Theresa of Austria.

relationships.target: 法兰兹一世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 玛丽·安托瓦内特是神圣罗马帝国皇帝法兰兹一世的女儿。
description.en: Marie Antoinette was the daughter of Holy Roman Emperor Francis I.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命推翻了君主制，导致玛丽·安托瓦内特被囚禁、审判并最终处决。
description.en: The French Revolution overthrew the monarchy, leading to Marie Antoinette's imprisonment, trial, and eventual execution.

description.zh-cn: 作为王太子妃，玛丽·安托瓦内特最初拒绝与国王路易十五的情妇杜巴利伯爵夫人交往，此举被视为政治失策。
description.en: As Dauphine, Marie Antoinette initially refused to acknowledge Madame du Barry, the mistress of King Louis XV, which was considered a political misstep.

description.zh-cn: 尽管玛丽·安托瓦内特并未实际参与钻石项链诈骗案，但这起丑闻严重损害了她的公众形象和声誉。
description.en: Although Marie Antoinette was not actually involved in the diamond necklace fraud, the scandal severely damaged her public image and reputation.

description.zh-cn: 革命法庭审判玛丽·安托瓦内特，并以叛国罪判处她死刑。
description.en: The Revolutionary Tribunal tried Marie Antoinette and sentenced her to death for treason.

description.zh-cn: 玛丽·安托瓦内特被指控在政治上偏袒她的故国奥地利，损害法国利益，例如在巴伐利亚王位继承战争中促使法国调停，并向奥地利泄露军事机密。
description.en: Marie Antoinette was accused of politically favoring her native Austria over French interests, such as pushing for French mediation in the War of the Bavarian Succession and leaking military secrets to Austria.

description.zh-cn: 玛丽·安托瓦内特被断头台处决。
description.en: Marie Antoinette was executed by the guillotine.

relationships.target: 汉斯·阿克塞尔·冯·费尔森

description.zh-cn: 玛丽·安托瓦内特与瑞典外交官汉斯·阿克塞尔·冯·费尔森伯爵之间存在极为深厚的情感联系，外界普遍认为他们是情人关系。费尔森策划了王室的瓦雷讷逃亡事件。
description.en: Marie Antoinette had a very deep emotional connection with the Swedish diplomat Count Hans Axel von Fersen, and they were widely believed to be lovers. Fersen organized the royal family's flight to Varennes.

relationships.source: 汉斯·阿克塞尔·冯·费尔森

description.zh-cn: 费尔森伯爵是策划和组织王室成员试图逃离巴黎的“瓦雷讷逃亡事件”的关键人物。
description.en: Count Fersen was the key figure in planning and organizing the royal family's attempt to escape Paris, known as the Flight to Varennes.

description.zh-cn: 失败的逃亡事件几乎摧毁了国王在人民中仅存的支持，严重损害了君主制的信誉。
description.en: The failed escape attempt nearly destroyed what little support the king still had among the people and severely damaged the credibility of the monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 玛丽·安托瓦内特与米拉波伯爵秘密会面并达成协议，后者成为王室的秘密政治盟友，试图调和君主制与革命。
description.en: Marie Antoinette secretly met with the Comte de Mirabeau and reached an agreement, making him a secret political ally of the crown in an attempt to reconcile the monarchy with the revolution.

description.zh-cn: 布伦瑞克宣言威胁要摧毁巴黎，激化了巴黎民众的情绪，直接引发了导致君主制被推翻的八月十日事件。
description.en: The Brunswick Manifesto's threat to destroy Paris radicalized the Parisian populace, directly triggering the Insurrection of 10 August 1792 which led to the overthrow of the monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 武装暴民攻入杜乐丽宫，迫使王室寻求立法议会庇护，此事标志着法国君主制的实际终结。
description.en: Armed mobs stormed the Tuileries Palace, forcing the royal family to seek refuge with the Legislative Assembly, an event that marked the effective end of the French monarchy.

relationships.target: 约瑟夫二世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 约瑟夫二世是玛丽·安托瓦内特的兄长。
description.en: Joseph II was the elder brother of Marie Antoinette.

description.zh-cn: 玛丽·安托瓦内特厌恶担任王室监管人的拉法叶侯爵，并于1791年11月成功阻止他当选巴黎市长。
description.en: Marie Antoinette detested the Marquis de Lafayette, who served as her custodian, and successfully blocked his election as mayor of Paris in November 1791.

description.zh-cn: 由罗伯斯比尔主导的救国委员会推动了对玛丽·安托瓦内特的审判，并预先决定了其死刑判决。
description.en: The Committee of Public Safety, led by Robespierre, pushed for the trial of Marie Antoinette and predetermined her death sentence.

description.zh-cn: 长女
description.en: Eldest daughter

description.zh-cn: 长女
description.en: Eldest daughter

relationships.source: 路易-约瑟夫 (法国王太子)

description.zh-cn: 长子
description.en: Eldest son

relationships.source: 路易-约瑟夫 (法国王太子)

description.zh-cn: 长子
description.en: Eldest son

description.zh-cn: 次子
description.en: Second son

description.zh-cn: 次子
description.en: Second son

description.zh-cn: 次女
description.en: Second daughter

description.zh-cn: 次女
description.en: Second daughter
